ActFirearms Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the STORAGE, DISPLAY, TRANSPORTATION AND HANDLING OF FIREARMS BY INDIVIDUALS REGULATIONS by adding the definition prohibited handgun and by allowing restricted firearms and prohibited handguns to be shipped by mail to another location in Canada.
